entry.summary: 丝绸之路（Silk Road）黑客因数十亿美元的比特币欺诈被判刑，其利用 Silk Road 取款系统中的漏洞进行了比特币抢劫，在承认电汇欺诈罪后被判处一年零一天监禁并失去其比特币。除了比特币，执法部门还缴获了近 662,000 美元的现金和 25 枚Casascius 硬币，这些硬币是为代表比特币而创建的物理金属硬币，

entry.title: 据彭博社，加密货币投资公司 BlockTower Capital 关闭其市场中性基金，该基金一度管理着超过 1 亿美元的资金。BlockTower 首席投资官 Ari Paul 表示，市场中性策...
entry.summary: 据彭博社，加密货币投资公司 BlockTower Capital 关闭其市场中性基金，该基金一度管理着超过 1 亿美元的资金。BlockTower 首席投资官 Ari Paul 表示，市场中性策略的机会在 2022 年之后急剧减少，以及去中心化金融投资策略相关的更高利率和日益增加的合规挑战也促成了决定关闭基金。

entry.summary: 数字资产投资公司 NovaWulf 准备接管已破产的加密货币贷方 Celsius Network 的所有资产，并在其债权人得到偿付后将其余下资产转入一家新公司。NovaWulf 将管理新公司五年，并计划将股权进行代币化。

entry.title: I think a reasonable ceiling for $eth % staking might be #bitcoin holders >1 year, which is currently around 60%. If you’re HODL’ing $eth for the lo...
entry.summary: I think a reasonable ceiling for $eth % staking might be #bitcoin holders >1 year, which is currently around 60%. If you’re HODL’ing $eth for the long-term, you probably would prefer some yield, even if it’s “only” 3-4%.

entry.summary: 吴说获悉，向 ConsenSys 提供客户支持票务服务的第三方服务提供商成为网络安全事件的目标。提交个人数据的 MetaMask 用户可能已被未经授权的第三方访问该数据。 估计全球约有7千名用户受到该事件的影响。该事件仅限于2021年8月1日至2023年2月10日期间向 MetaMask 客户支持提交个人数据的一定数量的用户

entry.title: One of least compelling arguments for crypto to dump I’ve heard is “an economic downturn will force crypto holders to sell to pay rent etc.” The ki...
entry.summary: One of least compelling arguments for crypto to dump I’ve heard is “an economic downturn will force crypto holders to sell to pay rent etc.” The kind of people buying crypto at this point are typically rich individuals or institutions. Forced selling doesn’t apply.

entry.title: Re There are a few projects claiming to provide defi privacy but are just a mere tornado fork underneath. However silent through its novel framework E...
entry.summary: Re There are a few projects claiming to provide defi privacy but are just a mere tornado fork underneath. However silent through its novel framework EZEE is able to provide anonymity and time-gapped confidentiality, which enables users to utilize any Web 3 application privately.

entry.title: Re Enter Silent Protocol, who is focused on providing privacy as a middleware solution for public blockchains. The project looks to solve this problem...

entry.title: Re But as blockchain usage increases, especially for crypto native institutions or businesses looking to enter the space, compliant privacy of blockch...
